subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Pablo Cuevas beat sixth-seeded Andreas Seppi, 6-3, 6-1, to become the first qualifier to reach the quarterfinals of the Croatia Open in Umag in seven years.
snippet: Pablo Cuevas beat sixth-seeded Andreas Seppi, 6-3, 6-1, to become the first qualifier to reach the quarterfinals of the Croatia Open in Umag in seven years.
